title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1205.3 - Bridges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1205.3 - Bridges

State Regulations
(a) All bridges. Vehicles the wheels of which are too narrow to pass safely over the expansion
joints of the bridge. (b) George

Washington Bridge--lower level and expressway. Vehicles using compressed
flammable gases; e.g., propane, butane, blaugas, liquefied petroleum gas, acetylene, as fuel for engines, heaters or refrigeration
elements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1205.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
